title: Manchester United v Chelsea: Premier League – live
summary: Ruben Amorim had a significant night at Old Trafford, showcasing his coaching prowess. Scott Murray provided a detailed minute-by-minute report on the match events. Fans eagerly followed the updates as the game unfolded.

title: Brighton v Tottenham, Wolves v Leeds in Premier League and more: football – live
summary: Stay updated on the four 3pm Premier League matches with live coverage by Billy Munday. Get real-time updates and insights throughout the games. Don't miss out on the latest developments in the league!

title: France v England: Women’s Rugby World Cup 2025 semi-final – live
summary: Lee Calvert provides live updates on the Rugby World Cup semi-final, detailing which teams secure their spot in the final. Fans can follow along for minute-by-minute coverage of the thrilling match. Stay tuned to see who advances to compete for the championship title.

title: Everton’s Grealish and Moyes hit out at referee over stoppage time
summary: Everton manager David Moyes expressed frustration over the three minutes of second-half stoppage time during their 2-1 loss to Liverpool. He found the allocation "very strange" and felt it was insufficient. This comment reflects his dissatisfaction with the match officiating.

title: ‘What the hell was that?’: Johnson-Thompson ties for world championship bronze in remarkable finale
summary: Katarina Johnson-Thompson secured a bronze medal in the heptathlon at the World Championships, finishing with the same points total as Taliyah Brooks. The tie resulted in both athletes sharing the podium. This marks a significant achievement for Johnson-Thompson in her athletic career.
